do not try to run the process task 'Run Project'

after completing code changes, compile the project to make sure there are no errors

always create a todo list before executing code changes

when placing headers, use the following format:

<header-format>
// ==================================================
// Constructor & Destructor
// ==================================================
</header-format>

use windows powershell commands in the terminal

use the display for debugging output because i cannot see serial output
